title: Spirited Away, Miyazaki's depiction of society
excerpt: Through this journey in the world of the spirits, the Japanese director takes a critical look at our current world.
picture_desc: Chihiro and the famous train scene

title: One Piece, popculture icon
excerpt: After more than 25 years of publication how to explain that this work is still successful.

title: Chang, when PNL reminds us of their past
excerpt: Divided between regret and good times, PNL takes us back to their childhood with a touch of melancholy.
picture_desc: The group contemplating Paris from the Eiffel Tower

title: Portugal, a journey through 800 years of history
excerpt: Portugal is a small country but a land full of history, let's travel through more than 800 years of existence composed of highs and lows.

title: A glow of hope for the future of the Earth
excerpt: “Fridays For Future”, “Youth for Climate”, you have probably heard their names, but who are they and why are they making so much noise?

title: What future for our planet?
excerpt: How much longer our planet will be able to endure our current way of life.

title: Others Projects
excerpt: Find in this section all the projects of the TP C2 group of the MMI department of Montbéliard.
